content: the night diamond snowflake is part of the snowfall crochet along 2022- the kids took over this pattern is available for free from this page or you can purchase the complete ebook of all 12 snowflake patterns here 1 this year i let my two boys who are currently about to turn 4 and 6 name the snowflakes i quite enjoyed hearing what they came up with as names i hope you enjoy these snowflakes and their names this pattern includes written instructions only and photo tutorial on stiffening snowflakes there are no charts please check out my other patterns in my ravelry store here 2 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/sources/snowfall-crochet-along-2022--the-kids-took-over 2 https //www ravelry com/stores/jessica-wifall-designs
